description:
During the annual Courage Test, when boys and girls are paired together in hopes of a love confession, Nina will be forced to take a hard look at the bond she shares with Zero and Ichii!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu no Gyouji wa Chou Shigekiteki!?
The Summer Event Is Super Stimulating!
夏の行事は超シゲキ的!?
